hasPart.name: Some worthwhile and interesting hiking suggestions
hasPart.text:
The Europa Panoramaweg is an ideal family hiking trail between the mountain station Goldried (2,190 m) in Matrei and the top station Blauspitz (2,305 m) in Kals am Grossglockner. Duration: 2.5 hours.

Climbing mountains: blue peak (2,575 m); Duration: 2.5 hours. Kendlspitze (3,085 m); Duration: about 5 hours.

Mountain station Goldried - Kals-Matreier Törl - Red mountain (2,762 m) - Cimaross left into Goldried - Goldriedsee - Europa Panoramaweg - mountain station Goldried. Duration: about 4 hours.

Mountain station Goldried - Kals-Matreier Törl - Kals height - Hochtor - Kals-Matreier Törl - Europa Panoramaweg - mountain station. The wholesale glockner is within reach and the view to the Tauern and Vir-gental is unique! Duration: about 5 hours.

Mountain station Blauspitz, Kal: Direct access to the fixed rope to the blue peak, excursion around the Blauspitze, Lehrweg living in snow and ice, Panorama for Kals-Matreier Törl and back on the Kals height - about 2.5 hours.
